trigger_condition: Meet her during night club exploration
morning_scene: She exhales peach-mango vape into your mouth, calling it 'a cleansing.'

trigger_condition: Accept her kebab and crash invite
morning_scene: She's playing ukulele at 6am, singing about your tourist aura.

outcome.effect: -10 SP, gain collectible Ballad of the Bros

morning_scene: She insults you, steals your cab voucher, leaves an NFT.

outcome.effect: Gain NFT #2, Hungover status, lose 25 gold

morning_scene: They argue over who 'won' you in a bet.

outcome.effect: Embarrassed status, gain Twin Token (+1 Grit, -2 Charm)

trigger_condition: Accept ICQ invite: 💊 Wanna vibe IRL?
morning_scene: You wake up in a neon Y2K tech room. She's gone.

outcome.effect: Inspired buff, gain Miss Morphine’s Discarded USB (???), unlock Sinfonia sidequest
